availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James N. Holloway (Lyon County, Kentucky, grocer.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, grocer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Son of Thomas Holloway and Jane Cowles Holloway. Married to Ellen Dix Holloway in Lyon County, Kentucky, on March 31, 1858. Father of Cora Holloway. Grocer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Lyon County in 1860. Grocer in Lyon County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 326B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 760.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 41A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lyon County, KY, June 1863, p. 7.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film 000321364.
J.H. Battle, W.H. Perrin, and G.C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, vol. 2 (Louisville, KY: F.A. Battey Publishing Company, 1885), 854.
"James Nathanael Holloway (1819-1896)," Find A Grave, Memorial 146749209, accessed January 26, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146749209.
